text: Vladimir Nikolaevich Shadrin (; June 6, 1948 – August 26, 2021) was a Soviet- Russian ice hockey centre player. He played in the Soviet Hockey League from 1964 to 1979 for HC Spartak Moscow. He also played in the Japan Ice Hockey League for Oji Seishi between 1979 and 1983. Shadrin also played for the national men's team. He won two gold medals at the 1972 and 1976 Winter Olympics. Shadrin was born in Moscow.
